title: Can't add contacts to Thunderbird address book
content:
I have been trying to add a new contact to Personal Address book. This process refuses to complete through the "New Contact" panel. However, I have Thunderbird set to add addresses from all sent emails to the address book, and if I send that same person an email, the email address does get added to contacts list.

I very rarely use the "Add Contact" process, so I don't know how long this fault has been present.

Any help please?
creator: vousden

title: How to restore local folders when upgrading from windows 10 to windows 11
content: I upgraded from windows 10 to 11 My son was able to recover my e-mail folders, but some large folders are missing and the remainder only have e-mails from 2019 or earlier. How do I recover those e-mails? I am no longer conversant with the current technology or terminology. I need simplistic instructions.
creator: morleyverdier1

title: メールの今までの履歴を検索してもリロード中になってしまいます。
content: トラブルシューティング情報より、プロファイルフォルダー内のglobal-messages-db.sqliteを消去する方法は試しましたが、変わりません。

title: Deleting a search folder without deleting the originals
content: Hi I completed a search of a folder and saved the results to a separate Search folder. After I "investigated" the listed messages, I wished to delete the "Search" folder. I was suspicious so compared the list in the Search folder with the Original. Found that the messages in the Search folder were now missing from the Original folder. So went back to Search folder and copied each message to the Original folder. As a check, I then recorded the details of six messages in the Original folder and deleted them from the Search folder. I found they were also deleted from the Original folder. Bummer! Edit\Undo Delete. Didn't work. Have apparently now lost the record of those six messages. Two questions: 1 Can those six messages be recovered? 2 Can the Search folder and the copies of the messages in it be deleted without loosing them from the Original folder? Thank you Graham
creator: grahamgarden

title: Email not read flag is resetting when compressing inbox and other folders
content: When I let thunderbird compress the inbox and other folders, the not read flags on all new emails get reset as if I have read all of the new emails. Compressing the inbox and other folders should have no effect on the flags showing a message has not yet been read. That only makes sense. The not read flags getting reset started happening several versions before 145.
creator: rbhall52
